name: The Space Protector
description:
Videogame made for #IdeaGameJam in 2018.

In this video game you have to protect the Intergalactic Government database from the evil space pirates. Made by:

Ignacio Pérez Mateo (@naxvader) - Game Designer and programmer.
Juan Labrador Ariza (https://www.artstation.com/pbdawan) - 3D artist and illustrator
